Welcome to the Society of Villainous Chaps website!

Thank you for dropping by our quaint little online abode, Old Horse. Here you can peruse various informative pages discussing our operations, structuring, etc. We do hope you enjoy your stay!

SoVC Website Online!

At last, we have a functioning website. Please do feel free to peruse - we heartily recommend a thorough gaze at our Rank Structure and Rules pages! Oh, and our Join Us page, should you so be including to partake in some very British gaming!
